entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 6. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
